subject: Cy Young Award
Baseball
lead_paragraph: After going 20-6 last season with a 2.73 E.R.A., the knuckleballer R. A. Dickey of the Mets won the Cy Young Award as the best pitcher in the National League.
snippet: After going 20-6 last season with a 2.73 E.R.A., the knuckleballer R. A. Dickey of the Mets won the Cy Young Award as the best pitcher in the National League.
